patterns: what are the symptoms of Coma
responses: COMA symptoms :- Someone who is in a coma is unconscious and has minimal brain activity. They're alive, but can't be woken up and show no signs of being aware.The person's eyes will be closed and they'll appear to be unresponsive to their environment. They won't normally respond to sound or pain, or be able to communicate or move voluntarily.

patterns: what are the symptoms of Non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD)
symptoms of Non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD)
responses: NON-ALCOHOLIC FATTY LIVER DISEASE symptoms :- Dull or aching pain in the top right of tummy (over the lower right side of the ribs). Fatigue. Unexplained weight loss. Weakness

patterns: what are the medicine for Non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD)?
Can you suggest any medicine for Non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD)
responses: NON-ALCOHOLIC FATTY LIVER DISEASE Medicine :- corticosteroids or pentoxifylline.

patterns: what are the symptoms of Obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD)
responses: OBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE DISORDER symptoms :- Obsession, Anxiety, Compulsion, Temporary relief.

patterns: what are the medicine for Obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD)
Can you suggest any medicine for Obsessive compulsive disorder (OCD)
responses: OBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE DISORDER Medicine:- Clomipramine (Anafranil),Fluoxetine (Prozac) .

patterns: what are the symptoms of Oesophageal cancer
responses: OESOPHAGEAL CANCER symptoms :- Indigestion or heartburn, Bringing up food soon after eating, Weight loss, Vomiting, Pain or discomfort in your upper tummy, chest or back, Tiredness, Shortness of breath and pale skin

patterns: what are the medicine for Oesophageal cancer
Can you suggest any medicine for Oesophageal cancer
responses: OESOPHAGEAL CANCER Medicine :- CONSULT DOCTOR!!!!!

patterns: what are the symptoms of Ovarian cyst
responses: OVARIAN CYST symptoms :- Symptoms if it splits (ruptures), is very large, or it blocks the blood supply to the ovaries.

patterns: what are the medicine for Ovarian cyst
Can you suggest any medicine for Ovarian cyst
responses: OVARIAN CYST Medicine :- ibuprofen (Advil), naproxen (Aleve), and acetaminophen (Tylenol).

patterns: what are the symptoms of Otitis externa
responses: OTITIS EXTERNA symptoms :- Ear pain,Itching and irritation in and around your ear canal,Redness and swelling of your outer ear and ear canal

patterns: what are the medicine for Otitis externa
Can you suggest any medicine for Otitis externa
responses: OTITIS EXTERNA Medicine  :- cetic acid, aminoglycosides, polymyxin B, and quinolones

responses: PANCREATIC CANCER Medicine:- CONSULT DOCTOR!!!

responses: PANIC DISORDER symptoms :- Sweating, Hot flushes, Choking sensation, Chest pain, Dizziness, Feeling faint, Numbness, Dry mouth.

patterns: what are the medicine for Panic disorder

responses: PANIC DISORDER Medicine :- Serotonin and norepinephrine

responses: PENILE CANCER symptoms :- Bleeding from the penis or from under the foreskin, foul-smelling discharge, A rash on the penis.

patterns: what are the symptoms of Prostate cancer
responses: PROSTATE CANCER symptoms :- Difficulty in starting to pee, Straining while urinating,Feeling bladder has not emptied fully.

patterns: what are the medicine for Prostate cancer?
Can you suggest any medicine for Prostate cancer?
responses: PROSTATE CANCER Medicine :- Abiraterone Acetate,Apalutamide,Bicalutamide,Cabazitaxel,Casodex (Bicalutamide),Darolutamide,Degarelix,Docetax.

patterns: what are  the symptoms of Postnatal depression
responses: PRESSURE ULCERS symptoms :- Low Mood, Loss of interest, Lack of energy, Trouble sleeping at night.

patterns: what are the medicine for Pressure ulcers?

responses: PRESSURE ULCERS medicine:- Pressure Injuries (Pressure Ulcers) and Wound Care Medication.

patterns: what are the symptoms of Psychosis
responses: PSYCHOSIS symptoms :- Hallucinations, Delusions, Confused & Disturbed thoughts, Lack of Insight and Self-awareness.

patterns: what are the medicine for Psychosis?
Can you suggest any medicine for Psychosis?
responses: PSYCHOSIS medicine:- Aripiprazole(Abilify), Asenapine(Saphris), Cariprazine(Vraylar), Lurasidone(Latuda)

patterns: what are the symptoms Psoriatic arthritis
responses: PSORIATIC ARTHRITIS symptoms :- The Pain, Swelling & Stiffness can affect any joint in the body like:- Hands,Feet,Knees,Elbows,Neck and Spine.

patterns: what are the medicine for Psoriatic arthritis?

responses: PSORIATIC ARTHRITIS medicine:- Biologic ustekinumab (Stelara), Etanercept (Enbrel)

patterns: what are the symptoms of Pneumonia
responses: PNEUMONIA symptoms :- A dry cough/Produce thick yellow/green/brown or blood-stained mucus, Difficulty breathing, Rapid heartbeat, Fever.

patterns: what are the medicine for Pneumonia?

responses: PNEUMONIA medicine:- Cleocin, Zithromax, Sulfatrim, Acticlate

responses: RESTLESS LEGS SYNDROME medicine:- Ropinirole(Requip), Pramipexole(Mirapex), Gabapentin enacarbil(Horizant)

patterns: what are the symptoms of Retinoblastoma
responses: RETINOBLASTOMA symptoms :- Poor vision, Not able to control eye movements, Red/Inflamed eye, Changed colour of Iris.

patterns: what rea the symptoms of Retinoblastoma in Children
responses: RETINOBLASTOMA IN CHILDREN symptoms :- White pupil that does not reflect light, The pupil of the affected eye may look white in photograph, Painful red eye.

patterns: what are the medicine for Retinoblastoma?
Can you suggest any medicine for Retinoblastoma?
responses: RETINOBLASTOMA medicine:-Surgery Radiation Therapy, Laser Therapy, Cryotherapy, Chemotherapy.

responses: RHABDOMYOSARCOMA medicine:- Cosmegen (Dactinomycin), Dactinomycin, Vincristine Sulfate.
